name: Slidee – Simple and fast SEO friendly slider
author: Kirill Babinec

sections.description:
Slidee is a simple and fast SEO friendly slider. No more heavy and loaded constructors. Only few simple options and your slider ready to include in site.

Features

• Fast and SEO friendly thanks to its simplicity.
• Pure code and markup.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Slidee, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Slidee” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download slidee.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select slidee.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download slidee.zip
  2. Extract the slidee directory to your computer
  3. Upload the slidee directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.0 / (26.12.2018)

  • Add random slides animation (slideIn, scale, opacity)
  • Refactoring to provide more futures later.

Version 1.0.1 / (09.11.2018)

  • Feature – Add slider overlay options (enable, color and opacity)

Version 1.0.0 / (08.11.2018)

  • initial release
